name: Blue Horizon Squad (chillyapples)
description:
A reimagining of the original Blue Horizon Squad.

Blue Horizon Squad is an action fps game. Play as Blue Horizon Squad characters as they get into different situations.

Development time was around 8 days.

Controls:

WASD to Move

Left Click to Fire

Right Click to Zoom

Space to Jump

Escape to return to Main Menu
